interactions:
Kayako - ticket id 60211680 // Daniel Soler commented publicly:  

This ticket can be closed

Kayako - ticket id 60211680 // Ibiso Barimalaa commented publicly: Dear Daniel,

Thank you for your patience on this request.
 
We have processed your request, and you should also now be able to see it when you navigate to Administration > Devices on the Web Portal [https://www.streetsmartmobile.com/adapter/guest/login.page] (If you can't see it, then please try selecting ALL Groups in the left pane [https://support.streetsmartmobile.com/article/63376-device-is-missing-on-account]).

It is currently linked to a placeholder user named e.g ".7868153707" and PIN the same as the number.

You can Edit this User [https://support.streetsmartmobile.com/article/63285-moving-user-to-another-group] to change their group, or Security Role [https://support.streetsmartmobile.com/article/63248-changing-role-of-user]  [https://support.fieldforcemanager.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017178940-Changing-the-Role-of-a-User?source=search&auth_token=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJhY2NvdW50X2lkIjoyMjA4MDQ4LCJ1c2VyX2lkIjozNzc2MTIwMjM0NjAsInRpY2tldF9pZCI6MzU1ODkyMSwiY2hhbm5lbF9pZCI6NjMsInR5cGUiOiJTRUFSQ0giLCJleHAiOjE2NDQ3MzM0ODJ9.451MbCJqmlyYAV080rDMosmX0OvSw777uRC-x7ARU3w]or add the details of the person to whom you would allocate this device. You can also Create a New User [https://support.streetsmartmobile.com/article/63312-creating-user-accounts] and Assign this Phone Number [https://support.streetsmartmobile.com/article/63113-assigning-phone-number-to-another-worker] to them.  If you create a new user and reassign the line, you would have to Retrieve the PIN [https://support.streetsmartmobile.com/article/63086-retrieving-pin-for-mobile-worker] and ask them to Activate the Mobile Application [https://support.streetsmartmobile.com/article/62617-activating-mobile-application] to link it to their user.

Best regards,
Ibiso Barimalaa
StreetSmart Support Team

This ticket will stay open for one week unless you reply with "This ticket can be closed" or update the status to Completed in the portal. We will write to you again to remind you.

Kayako - ticket id 60211680 // Alexandr Oliynyk commented publicly: Dear Daniel,

Thank you for your patience.

We have checked and found that the number 7868153707 is assigned to the 102817 COID, which has not been transitioned to StreetSmart yet. 
Could you please login to COID 102817 and transition it to StreetSmart and then we will be able to move the number to another COID 104983 (as currently this number has an FFM package).

Best regards,
Alexandr Oliynyk
StreetSmart Support Team

This ticket will stay open for one week unless you reply with "This ticket can be closed" or update the status to Completed in the portal. We will write to you again to remind you.
